actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution to establish a select committee to review the accounts of all committees of the House.

summary.text: Creates a House select committee which shall conduct an investigation of all records, memorandums, papers, documents, books, and other information of any standing or select committee of the House or officer of the House respecting expenses incurred by or on behalf of any such committee or its members or employees.

titles.title: Resolution to establish a select committee to review the accounts of all committees of the House.
